table_description: Contains records of all employee training programs, including course details, costs, completion status, and certifications obtained from 2024 to 2025.
use_cases: Calculate training costs by employee or department
data_quality_notes: status is TEXT with CHECK constraint - use exact matches: 'Completed', 'In Progress', 'Scheduled', 'Cancelled'
cost is in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah) with DECIMAL(12,2) precision
certification_obtained is BOOLEAN - TRUE if certification was awarded, FALSE otherwise
duration_hours is integer representing total training duration
Sample data contains 12 training records for various employees
Cost can be NULL for some trainings

table_columns.name: training_id
table_columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each training record.

table_columns.name: employee_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to employees table. References the employee who attended the training.

table_columns.name: training_name
table_columns.description: Name or title of the training program (e.g., 'Advanced Python Programming', 'Leadership Development Program').

table_columns.name: training_category
table_columns.description: Category of the training (e.g., 'Technical', 'Soft Skills', 'Leadership', 'Sales', 'Marketing'). Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: start_date
table_columns.description: Date when the training started. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: end_date
table_columns.description: Date when the training ended. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: duration_hours
table_columns.description: Total duration of the training in hours.

table_columns.name: cost
table_columns.description: Cost of the training in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah). Can be NULL. Use COALESCE for aggregations.

table_columns.name: status
table_columns.description: Current status of the training. Allowed values: 'Completed', 'In Progress', 'Scheduled', 'Cancelled'. Use exact string matches in queries.

table_columns.name: certification_obtained
table_columns.description: Indicates whether a certification was obtained. TRUE if certified, FALSE otherwise. Default is FALSE.

table_columns.name: trainer_name
table_columns.description: Name of the trainer or instructor who conducted the training. Can be NULL.
